projects.title: Impostor (PWA Mini Game)
projects.description: A lightweight, mobile-first Progressive Web App party game. Features offline support, minimal bundle size, and smooth performance on all devices. Built with modern web technologies for an engaging multiplayer experience.

details.content: A web-first PWA intended to run smoothly on mobile browsers. Offline support and minimal bundle size.

projects.title: Payments Data Pipeline
projects.description: Event-driven data ingestion system using Kafka, Spark, and Delta Lake on Databricks. Implements retry logic, dead letter queues (DLQ), and real-time processing. Powers BI-ready data marts for analytics and reporting.

details.summary: Kafka ‚Üí Spark ‚Üí Delta Lake with Databricks.
details.content: Event-driven ingestion with retries and DLQ. Delta Lake tables power BI-ready data marts.
